com.versant.common.dataservice
Class VDSClass

java.lang.Object
  com.versant.common.dataservice.VDSClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
VDSDBClass
public class VDSClass
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

This class contains the schema information for a class. This represents the class object for persistent and transient objects. It consists of a list of attribute objects.

See Also:
VDSObject, , Serialized Form

registerListener

public void registerListener(byte events,
                             VDSIClassListener listener)
Description copied from class: VDSClass
adds a class listener to the list of listeners. The events parameter indicates the events that the listener is interested in. It is simply or'd list of various event types.

Parameters:
events - type
listener - class listener
Throws:
VDSException
See Also:
VDSIClassListener

unregisterListener

public void unregisterListener(byte events,
                               VDSIClassListener listener)
Description copied from class: VDSClass
Disables the given listener from the list of listeners for the specified event types. If no events are specified (i.e. events = 0), then the listener is removed from the list of listeners.

Parameters:
events - type
listener - class listener
Throws:
VDSException
See Also:
VDSIClassListener

getListeners

public VDSListenerEnumeration getListeners(byte events)
Description copied from class: VDSClass

events - event type
